TopicTitle: Kerbols flare detaching from Kerbol in tracking station

Articles.Content:
Description of Bug: Kerbols flare detaching from Kerbol in tracking station
Steps to Replicate: hate to submit a bug without detailed replication steps but all I know is that it occurred while switching focus of planets in the tracking station.
Fixes / Workarounds:  unknown
